title: kill命令的问题
author: Ice_Frog
txt_content:
当我使用这个命令的时候，我怎样给他制定半径
/minecraft:kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
Ice_Frog 发表于 2019-6-18 21:11
是1.14.2版本的~
话说大佬最近很活跃啊。。到处都能看到你
高考考完了时间多。


/kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,distance=..10]

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 FHC红石 于 2019-6-18 22:16 编辑 

/minecraft:kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,distance=..半径]
我写错了干

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
/kill @e[type=minecraft:armor_stand,r=10]

也许吧，如果我没写错的话

replies.txt_content:
